2.「よいところに 来てくれた……。| すまぬが わしに手を貸してくれ。| 困ったこ: You've come to the right place. I'm sorry,|but you're going to have to help me. I'm in|trouble.

3.「見てくれ この杖を……。| 見た目は似ているが こいつはニセモノ……。| 物言: Look at this cane. It looks like it, but|this is a fake. It's a mute wand.

4.「本物の杖は…… あの ルナナが持っておる。| あやつが 杖を奪っていったのじゃ: The real cane... Lunana has it. He took it|from me. He put the fake one there to harass|me. What?

8.「す…すまぬ……。あの杖が なくては……| わしは…… 思い通りに動けんのだ。|: I'm sorry... I'm sorry. Without that cane...|I... I can't move. I can barely talk now.

9.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため| わしの杖を 利用しようと……| 考え: ... Lunana will use my staff to defeat the|hexenbiest Byblos. To defeat the hexenbiest|Byblos.

10.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの| 潜んでいる場所を突き止め 向かっている…: He's already tracked down the location of|the hexenbiest, Byblos, and he's on his way.|We have to catch up to him.

11.「頼む……。その ラニ大洞穴の奥地まで| わしを 連れていってくれんか……？: Please... Will you take me to the depths of|the Great Cave of the Lani?

12.「ありがたい。恩に着るぞ……。| ビュブロスの毒牙に かからぬよう……| ルナナ: Yes. I owe you. Do not fall into the fangs|of Byblos... We must protect Lunana and the|others.

13.「わしは おぬしのうしろを ついていく……。| 道中 何が起こるか…わからんから: I will follow behind you. What happens on|the way... I don't know what will happen on|the way. So please be prepared.

14.「引き受けてくれるのは ありがたいが……。| おぬしは…… 他の者の依頼が| た: I appreciate you taking me on, but... But|you... I see you have a lot of other|people's requests.

15.「仕方あるまい……。| わしは しばらく ここにいるから| 先に そちらを片付け: It's no use. I'll be here for a while, so go|take care of that first.

16.「……そうか。| だが わしひとりでは 思うように動けん……。| 気が変わったら: .... But I can't move as fast as I want to|on my own. If you change your mind, come|back.

17.「うう……。<pc>か？| ……すまぬが わしに手を貸してくれ。| ルナナに 杖: Ugh. <pc>? ... I'm sorry. You|have to help me. Lunana has stolen my wand.

18.「あの杖が なくては……| わしは…… 思い通りに動けぬ……。| 今も 話してい: Without that cane... I... I can't move as|much as I'd like. I can barely talk.

19.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため| わしの杖を 利用しようと……| 考え: ... Lunana will use my staff to defeat the|hexenbiest Byblos. To defeat the hexenbiest|Byblos.

20.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの潜んでいる| ラニ大洞穴に 向かっているはず: He's already headed for the Great Lani|Caves, where the hexenbiest Byblos lurks.|We've got to catch up to him.

21.「ラニ大洞穴は アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け| すこし 西に行った所にある……。|: The Great Lani Cave is a little further|west, past the cave north of Agrani. Take me|to its depths.

22.「……ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを倒すため| わしの杖を 奪っていった……。| あ: ... Lunana took my staff to defeat the|hexenbiest Byblos. Without it, I cannot move|as I wish.

23.「あやつは すでに 魔獣ビュブロスの潜んでいる| ラニ大洞穴に 向かっているはず: He's already headed for the Great Lani|Caves, where the hexenbiest Byblos lurks.|We've got to catch up to him.

24.「ラニ大洞穴は アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け| すこし 西に行った所にある……。|: The Great Lani Cave is a little further|west, past the cave north of Agrani. Take me|to its depths.

25.「わしは おぬしのうしろを ついていく……。| 道中 何が起こるか…わからんから: I will follow behind you. What happens on|the way... I don't know what will happen on|the way. So please be prepared.

26.「<pc>よ 頼んだぞ……。| ビュブロスの毒牙に かからぬよう……| ルナナた: <pc>, please. Do not fall into|the fangs of the Byblos... Protect Lunana|and the others.

27.「どうだ <cs_pchero>……。| ルナナのヤツは いるか……？: What do you think, <cs_pchero>. Is|Lunana here...?

29.「し…しまった……！| ルナナと出会う前に ビュブロスが……！| わしとしたこと: Sh... Oh, no...! Before I met Lunana, there|was Byblos. What I did... What I did... What|a mistake.

30.「ダ…ダメだ…… 身体が……。| こんなとき…に…… わしは……| 何も……でき: Da... No... My body... At a time like|this... I can't... I... I can't... I|can't... I can't... I can't...

35.「ま まさか…… おぬし……| わしが寝ている間に 魔獣ビュブロスを| 倒してし: No, no way... You... Did you defeat the|hexenbiest Byblos while I was sleeping?

36.「お…おぬしが ここまでやるとは……。| これならば 残りの １頭も……。: Oh... I never thought you'd go this far. Now|you can get the rest of them.

38.「真の復讐の のろし……。| まさか……。: The smoke of true vengeance. No way.

40.「ちょっと どういうこと！？| また手柄を 横取りしてくれちゃったワケ！？: Hey, what's going on? Did you just steal all|the credit again?

41.「ル…ルナナ……。探したぞ……。| さあ 杖を…返せ……。| そして…… ビュブ: Le... Lunana. I've been looking for you.|Come on, give me your... Give it back.|And... From Byblos... Get out of my sight.

42.「あらあら。いつもの威勢は| どこに いってしまったのかしら？| なに言ってるの: Ah. Where's all the bluster? I can't hear|what you're saying.

43.「ウフフ……。この杖がないと| さすがの 大賢者ブロッゲンさまも| かたなしのよ: Uh-huh. Without this staff, even the great|sage Brogen would be at a loss!

44.<shake_big>「この小娘ッ！ いいかげんにするのでアール！！| お前のチ: <shake_big>You little bitch! I've had enough of this!|Your power is no match for Byblos, Earl!

45.「さっさと ブロッゲンさまの手に| ワガハイを 戻すのでアール！！: I will return the Wagahai to the hands of|Mr. Blodgen as soon as possible.

46.「うるっさい 棒ね。| そう わめかなくても 最後の魔獣を倒したら| 納屋の つ: Shut up. You don't have to rant, but after|you kill that last hexenbiest, I'm gonna|make you a stick in the barn.

47.「さあ ムチェ ブチャ！ 行くわよ！: Come on, Muche, Bucha! Let's go!

48.「待て…… ルナナ……。| お前だけは 行かせん……。| 行かせては……ならんの: Wait... Lunana. You're the only one I won't|let go. You can't... You can't.

52.「クッ……。| わしは…… 血塗られた運命から| ルナナを 守ってやれぬのか……: Kuh. I... Can't I protect Renana from her|bloody fate?

53.「すまぬ <cs_pchero>よ……。| アグラニの上の町にある宿屋まで| わ: I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. Will you|please escort me to the inn in the town|above Agrani?

54.「くわしい話は そこでしよう……。: We'll talk more about it there.

55.「おお <pc>……。ご苦労であった……。| おぬしのおかげで 無事に| ここま: Thank you for your hard work. Thanks to you,|I made it all the way back here in one|piece.

56.「外にいるよりは いくぶん 身体が楽だ……。| ……今こそ ルナナに まつわる|: It's a little easier than being outside. ...|Now is the time to talk about the bloody|past of Lunana.

57.「かつて 魔獣ビュブロスたちの親……| レオン・ビュブロと戦ったとき| わしは: "Once upon a time, the father of all|Hexenbiests... I was not alone when I fought|Leon Byblos.

58.「そのかたわらには あのルナナの父……| ホルタ神父が いたのだ……。: And on the other side, the father of|Lunana... Father Horta.

59.「ホルタは…… 面倒見のいい| アグラニの名士であると同時に| 呪文の扱いに長け: Horta... He was a good Agrani priest and an|excellent spellcaster.

60.「だが その戦いのさなか……| ホルタは 命を落としてしまった……。| そして: But in the heat of battle... Horta lost his|life. And on his deathbed, he said.

61.「娘のルナナが 復讐心に囚われることなく| 生きていくために……| はやり病で:
To keep my daughter, Renana, from being|consumed by the desire for revenge...|Pretend that she died of a virulent|
|disease...

62.「これが あやつの遺言だ……。: This is his last will and testament.

63.「わしは その遺志を継ぐ者として……| なんとしてでも ホルタの娘……| ルナナ: I'm the one to carry on his legacy... I will|do everything in my power... I must protect|Lunana.

64.「……<pc>よ。| そのためにも おぬしのチカラが必要だ……。| 時が来たら: ... I need your help to do that. And when|the time comes, I'll need your help.

65.「ひとまず これは 今回の分の礼だ。| 受け取ってくれ……。: For the time being, this is for this. Take|it.

66.「わしは ホッツィたちに 協力を求めながら| ルナナの足取りを 追うことにする…: I'm going to follow Lunana's footsteps, and|I'm going to ask Hotsy and the others for|help. Come back here in a little while.

67.「次こそ…… 親子二代に渡り| 魔獣の牙にかかるという 血塗られた運命から| ル: Next time... I must free Renana from the|bloody fate of being trapped under the fangs|of a hexenbiest for two generations!

68.「魔獣ビュブロスは アグラニの北のほら穴を抜け| すこし 西に行った所にある|: The magical beast Byblos lurks in a cavern|called the Great Cave of Lani, a little to|the west of the cave north of Agrani.

70.「グェへへへへ……。もうすぐだ……。| 長兄の手で 真の復讐の のろしが| もう: Ghehehehehehe. Soon. The dawn of true|vengeance at the hands of my eldest brother|will soon rise.

71.「オレらは おとりに過ぎねえ……。| 父のカタキ…… 必ず とってみせる……。|: We're just a decoy. My father's body...|We'll get him. Wise Brogen... Prepare|yourself.
